## Interactive 3D Plot

```{julia}
using Plots
plotly()

# Create a 3D surface plot
z = [10 * sin(i/10) * cos(j/10) for i in 1:100, j in 1:100]
p = surface(z, title="Interactive 3D Surface", xlabel="X", ylabel="Y", zlabel="Z")
display(p)
```
